short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will replace the phrase political correctness with its alternative - not-being-a-dickness

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When people say 'Political Correctness' with disdain, they're getting it all wrong. Get a grip on what we really mean when using politically correct terminology by transforming all content on the internet. The extension replaces the term 'Political Correctness' with 'Not-Being-A-Dickness'. This simple Chrome extension will transform your online reading experience.
